address.name: Address*
address.tooltip: Complete address of the service(No PO BOX)

description.name: Description*
description.default: Providing free meals to those in need

hours.name: Hours
hours.tooltip: Hours of operation. Will be displayed as plain text.

logo.name: Logo
logo.tooltip: Link to just the logo of the service. Will be displayed as an image.

language.name: Language
language.tooltip: Languages that the service offers. Comma separated. Ex: English, Spanish

date_needed.name: Date Needed
date_needed.tooltip: The date that refugees must have entered the US after. If it does not matter leave blank. In mm-dd-yyyy format. Ex: 01-01-2023

services_offered.name: Services Offered*
services_offered.default: Free meals, food pantry, nutrition counseling
services_offered.tooltip: Services Offered by this service. Comma separated. Please be consistent across services for search Ex: Free meals, food pantry, nutrition counseling

restrictions.name: Restrictions
restrictions.tooltip: Any restrictions on who can use the service. Ex: Must be 18+

next_steps.name: Next Steps*
next_steps.default: Call or email to schedule an appointment
next_steps.tooltip: What the refugee should do next. Ex: Call or email to schedule an appointment
